sub_title: International Leisure and Event Management Student | Breda University of Applied Sciene
summary:
Aspiring international leisure and event management professional who loves to blend strategic thinking and creative flair. My passion for innovation, storytelling and intercultural perspectives lead me to strive for an inspiring career within the leisure and events industry, trying to deliver impactful events that exceed expectations.

Since I was thirteen, I have been immersed in an intercultural environment. That made me master the ability of cross-cultural communication. Next to that, I developed the skill of quick adaptation to any situation, which means I am very flexible. I am a problem solver, so I enthusiastically take your challenge. I get satisfaction in finding solutions.
 
I am constantly seeking new opportunities to learn and grow as a professional. Whether attending industry events, taking on challenging projects or seeking mentorship from experienced professionals, I am committed to expanding my knowledge and skill set in event management.

Personal growth and development are essential, and I am dedicated to continuously improving myself personally and professionally. Join me as I seek new challenges and push myself outside my comfort zone.

If you want to get to know me more or would like me to be on your team, please check my profile or email me at martaabonillaa@gmail.com
